subject: Football
Hurricane Katrina
lead_paragraph: The struggling, half-filled city of New Orleans, hit a little more than 16 months ago by Hurricane Katrina and now in the midst of a spree of murders, has found an escape route.
snippet: The struggling, half-filled city of New Orleans, hit a little more than 16 months ago by Hurricane Katrina and now in the midst of a spree of murders, has found an escape route.
